items.sentence: Tom got up and started to leave, but Mary stopped him.
I asked whether Tom was planning on doing that or not.
Our present house is too small, so we decided to move.
Now that the war is over, we need to start rebuilding.
At this time, we still don't know if this is feasible.
Tom said that he didn't think Mary would've done that.
Tom said that he didn't think Mary could've done that.
Tom hasn't yet finished reading the book you lent him.
Tom was caught with stolen property in his possession.
Since I don't have a job, I get unemployment benefits.
